usage_rules.headings: Use 'Roboto Mono' for all H1-H3. Uppercase, tracking-wide (tracking-[0.2em]). Font weight: Bold (700) or Black (900).
usage_rules.body: Use 'Inter' for all body text, labels, and inputs. High legibility.
usage_rules.data_numbers: Use 'Roboto Mono' for all metrics, pricing, and tabular data.
usage_rules.anti_patterns: Do not use Inter for main headings. Do not use default font weights (400) for headings.

colors.theme_strategy: Hybrid. Dark Mode (Slate-900) is the default 'Pro' interface. Light Mode (Slate-50) is available for documentation/printing.

primary.name: Electric Blue
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, key highlights.

surface.usage: Cards, sidebars, modals. MUST use backdrop-blur-md.

borders.usage: All containers must have a 1px border.

gradients.allowed: Subtle 'Tracing Beam' gradients on borders only.

spacing.rule: Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.rules: Dense, compact. Widgets must stretch (h-full). No jagged bottoms.

styling_rules.cards: Glassmorphism (bg-slate-800/50 backdrop-blur-md). 1px border (border-slate-700). No shadow in dark mode.
styling_rules.buttons: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-sm). Primary: Electric Blue. Secondary: Ghost/Outline.
styling_rules.inputs: Flat, slate-900 background, border-slate-700. Focus: Ring-2 ring-blue-600.

libraries.icons: Lucide React (default), Phosphor Icons (for technical density)
libraries.3d: React Mesh Gradient (for background) or Custom SVG

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md' and 'bg-opacity-50' for all floating elements.
visual_enhancers.mesh_background: Subtle animated SVG wireframe in the background of the Landing and Auth pages.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'border-collapse' style for data grids. 1px solid borders.

hero_background.description: Abstract geometric city skyline, use for Landing Page Hero Background with overlay.

project_creation.description: Engineer drawing floor plan, use for Project Creation / Upload section.

construction_site.description: Crane against glass building, use for 'About' or 'Features' section.

general: Do not use gradients for text.
accessibility: Ensure contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text.
Interactive elements must have focus states (ring-2).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Industrial Future' aesthetic. Start with the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid' and the abstract wireframe background. Then build the Dashboards using the 'Control Room' layout. Use the defined color palette strictly. Ensure all Shadcn components are customized to match the 'Glassmorphism' and 'Sharp Edge' style.
